name: The Quest of An Ant storing food
name_original: The Quest of An Ant storing food
description:
A submission for the Game Off game jam 2021, with the theme "Bug".

This is also my first game jam and my first game to be published as well... finally I actually finished something.

DESCRIPTION

Your are an ant, doing your job of storing food for the colony and the Queen. However, trouble lies ahead. Will it be easy? Find out in this short pixel-art, gameboy-styled game!

And warning, this game is a little... buggy.

Please provide feedback if you can as I am still a learning beginner, they would really be appreciated. :)
